definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Several ocean-going ships are being laid down here.
sentences.chinese: 这里正在建造几艘远洋货轮。

sentences.english: Proportionate reductions of the Bank Guarantee will be made on delivery of each DHCS.
sentences.chinese: 每交付一艘深舱货轮，银行保函金额应按比例减少。

sentences.english: Our company's cargo vessels have fixed anchorages in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司的货轮在这个港口有固定的锚位。

sentences.english: It is reported that the cargo ship incident waves 8-10 m waters.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，这艘货轮出事海域浪高8至10米。

sentences.english: The picture shows the first cargo ship anchors at Gwadar Port.
sentences.chinese: 图为首艘货轮停靠在瓜达尔港。

sentences.english: The harbour admits large tankers and freighters.
sentences.chinese: 这个港口容得下巨型油船和货轮。

sentences.english: A new-type ocean-going freighter is being laid down at that ship yard.
sentences.chinese: 一艘新型的远洋货轮正在那家船厂建造。

sentences.english: The DHCS shall be delivered at port A after due trial voyage and tests.
sentences.chinese: 深舱货轮经试航和测试后在A港交船。

sentences.english: Six 10000-ton freighters can berth at this dock.
sentences.chinese: 6艘万吨货轮可以同时在这个码头停靠。

sentences.english: They have thrown out a pier to accommodate oceangoing freighters.
sentences.chinese: 他们建成一个凸式码头供停靠远洋货轮使用。

sentences.english: This freighter can carry a cargo of coal direct from Shanghai to Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 这艘货轮可以把一船煤直接从上海运到东京。

sentences.english: Tender value should be stated in United States Dollars or as an alternative in the currency of the DHCS building country.
sentences.chinese: 投标价格应以美元或深舱货轮制造国的货币表示。

sentences.english: Six 10,000-ton freighters can berth at this dock.
sentences.chinese: 六艘万吨货轮可以同时在这个码头停靠。

sentences.english: D. 15% of the Unit Price oil the launching of each DHCS.
sentences.chinese: 每艘深舱货轮下水时，支付船价的15%。

sentences.english: E. 25% of the Unit Price on the delivery of each DHCS.
sentences.chinese: 每艘深舱货轮交货时，支付船价的25%。

sentences.english: A new-type ocean-going freighter is being laid down at that shipyard.
sentences.chinese: 一艘新型的远洋货轮正在那家船厂建造。

definition: tugboat/boat towed by a tugboat/to tow a boat
